explains: n. 鲭（产于北大西洋）；马鲛鱼

sentences.en: Almiro's boat had sailed out to the middle of the bay to fish for mackerel.
sentences.cn: 阿尔米罗的船已驶向海湾中部去捕鲭鱼。

sentences.en: It is not only tuna but sardine, mackerel and other fish that are in decline.
sentences.cn: 不仅仅是金枪鱼，沙丁鱼，鲭鱼和其他鱼类也在减少。

sentences.en: Swordfish, shark, tilefish, fresh tuna steak, and king mackerel are the main culprits.
sentences.cn: 剑鱼、鲨鱼、方头鱼、新鲜的金枪鱼排和鲭鱼是罪魁祸首。
